DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of AXOS on parameters of colon metabolism and gut health
DOC.brief_title: Effect of AXOS on the Colon Metabolism in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers regular dietary pattern (3 meals/day) age: 1845y BMI: 18,527 kg/m2 intake of antibiotics 1 month prior to the study abdominal surgery in the past, with the exception of appendectomy intake of medication influencing the gastrointestinal system 14 days prior to the study in treatment at a dietician serious liver or kidney failure vegetarians intake of pre and/or probiotics Exposure to radioactivity 1 year prior to the study
